name: Treerazer
content:
Treerazor

Lord of the Blasted Tarn

Source Inner Sea Gods pg. 328
Pathfinder Wiki Treerazor

Details

Alignment CE
Pantheon Nascent Demon Lords
Areas of Concern Corruption of nature, pollution
Domains Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Plant
Subdomains Catastrophe, Decay, Demon (Chaos), Demon (Evil), Rage
* Requires the Acolyte of Apocrypha trait.
Favored Weapon Greataxe
Symbol Axe in bleeding tree stump
Sacred Animal(s) Deinonychus
Sacred Color(s) Black, green

Obedience

Feast on rotting flesh infested with hallucinogenic or poisonous fungus, then meditate upon the harrowing visions they provide.

Boons - Demonic Obedience

Demoniac

Source Book of the Damned - Volume 2: Lords of Chaos pg. 39
1: First Boon (Sp) warp wood 1/day
2: Second Boon (Sp) antiplant shell 1/day
3: Third Boon (Sp) repel wood 1/day
